refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Assigns the color rgb(0-255) to the existing combination named combination_name.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the command comb_color to assign a specific color to a specific region.

example.title: Assign a color to a specific region.
example.para: Assigns the color green to region1.
